summary: Katana master Tao leads a special ops squad of ex-military vigilantes on a massacre mission, their target: vampires on an post apocalyptic globe. Tao is the survivors' only hope and he knows the only cure is execution.
cast: Steven Seagal|Tanoai Reed|Jenna Harrison|Danny Midwinter|Emma Catherwood|Stephen Hagan|Daniel Percival|Skye Bennett|Tania Dobre|Mihaela Constantin|Linden Ashby|Keith David|Clay Donahue Fontenot|Stephen Haynes|Stefan Iancu|Mihaela Elena Oros|Claudiu Bleont|Andreea Ungureanu|Dan Chiriac|Meda Andreea Victor|Bogdan Farkas|Anatoli Ciumac|Filip Ciprian Florian|Mihai Ungureanu|Bujor Macrin|Daniel Pisica|Dian Hristov|Coca Zibilianu|Alan O'Silva|Jeff Chase
keywords: man murders a woman|shooting a woman|vampire|virus|survivor
title: Cazadores de sangre
